participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and imaginative, enjoys connecting with others and exploring new worlds through books.
participant_1.background: My weight is normal. I have women calling me all the time. I enjoy playing recreational games like cards, darts, or billiards. I worry about my image. I love to curl up with a good book and lose myself in another world.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, passionate about art and enjoys sharing his work with others.
participant_2.background: I am moving because my job at the pizza parlor is not giving me enough money. After I go for a run, my head is cleared and I am ready to create more websites. I get to make gummy worms all day long, which is a dream come true for me! I rent my apartment because I have ink stains on all my shirts. I can draw.

content.text: Hi! how are you doing today?
Good! Just moved to a new apartment and I'm excited to start my new job!
That's awesome! What are you doing for work?
I'm going to be making gummy worms!
That sounds fun! I bet you love it!
I do! I get to draw and create new flavors all the time.
That's awesome! What is your favorite thing to draw?
I love drawing animals and plants. I also like to draw cartoons.
Those sound like great things to draw! Do you share your art online anywhere?
I do! I have an Instagram account where I post my work.
Cool! I'll have to check it out.
You should! I'd love to hear what you think of my work.
Sounds good! I'm sure it's great!
I hope so!
Are you a big reader?
Yes! I love to curl up with a good book and lose myself in another world.
Me too! What's your favorite genre of books?
I like to read a variety of genres, but I especially love fantasy and sci-fi.
Those are great genres! I love the world building and imagination that goes into them.
Me too! I love being able to escape into a different world for a while.
Me too
